author: Master_Wu
title: A cute character!
review:
This Mixel is very nice looking and cute!

This figure is supposed to depict a walking fire hydrant and it does do a decent job at capturing the detail!

There are also some very nice parts in this build! there are some red fenders, some hooks and joints, and a cool water bucket!

While the build itself does not have great play values, I recommend this set for any fan of Lego!
